# init(title:sections:assistantCellConfiguration:headerGridButtons:)

**Initializer**

Initialize a list template with one or more grid buttons to displayed in a list header.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor init(title: String?, sections: [CPListSection], assistantCellConfiguration: CPAssistantCellConfiguration?, headerGridButtons: [CPGridButton]?)
```
title: init(title:sections:assistantCellConfiguration:headerGridButtons:)
